headline: Teledyne Technologies (TDY): Assessing Valuation After Q3 Earnings Beat and Upgraded Outlook
summary: Teledyne Technologies (TDY) just delivered its third-quarter results, with revenue for the period climbing 7% year-over-year. Management also raised their full-year earnings forecast. This update is catching investor attention given the strong defense-related demand. See our latest analysis for Teledyne Technologies. Following the upbeat earnings report and higher outlook, Teledyne Technologies’ shares have gained meaningful momentum this year. The company’s 25.3% year-to-date share price...

headline: Why Teledyne (TDY) Stock Is Down Today
summary: Shares of digital imaging and instrumentation provider Teledyne (NYSE:TDY) fell 5.1% in the morning session after the company reported third-quarter results that beat expectations but provided a disappointing earnings forecast for the next quarter.

headline: Teledyne (NYSE:TDY) Surprises With Q3 Sales
summary: Digital imaging and instrumentation provider Teledyne (NYSE:TDY) reported Q3 CY2025 results topping the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 6.7% year on year to $1.54 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $5.57 per share was 1.8% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Teledyne beats Q3 expectations, raises full-year earnings outlook
summary: Investing.com -- Teledyne Technologies Incorporated (NYSE:TDY) reported record third-quarter sales and earnings that exceeded analyst expectations, as the company benefited from strong performance in its defense-related businesses and recent acquisitions.

headline: Teledyne: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The results topped Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of five analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $5.50 per share. The defense and aerospace industry supplier posted revenue of $1.54 billion in the period, also topping Street forecasts.
